site_name: Land At Hook Venturer Sports Club
decision_conditions: Existing outbuilding - we are still awaiting Existing Floor Plans and Elevations of the outbuilding since the Site Plan and photos show an outbuilding. Please provide Existing Floor Plans and Elevations at a recognised scale (at 1:50 or 1:100 for example) and indicating key dimensions. A scale bar is encouraged.
Due to this imprecise information regarding the existing piggy back roof extension, officers have been unable to assess full compliance with the legislation

application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by Condition 30 (Delivery and Servicing Plan), Condition 31 (Car Park Management Plan) and Condition 32 (Travel Plan) of Planning Permission 18/10212/FUL (Proposed variation of Condition 2 (Approved Plans) for internal floor plate alterations and external elevation alterations, Condition 33 (S278 RBK) and Condition 35 (S278 TfL) of planning permission 15/10383/FUL (Construction of Headquarters development comprising B1(a) (Office) and associated and ancillary floorspace together with access from Jubilee Way, HGV access from Kingston Road, car-parking, landscaping and associated engineering works))
